items.content_html: A fun and interactive number guessing game implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Players are prompted to guess a randomly generated number within a specified range. The game provides hints and feedback to guide the player towards the correct answer. It's a lightweight, web-based game that offers an enjoyable experience for users of all ages.
items.title: nagesh882/number-guessing-game: A fun and interactive number guessing game implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Players are prompted to guess a randomly generated number within a specified range. The game provides hints and feedback to guide the player towards the correct answer. It's a lightweight, web-based game that offers an enjoyable experience for users of all ages.
